sourcesContent: import { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Alert } from "reactstrap"; const ProductAddNew = (props) => { const [productId, setProductId] = useState(''); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); return ( Add New Product Back to All Products Product #{product.productId} Product #{product.name} Product #{product.description} Product #{product.price} ); }; export default ProductAddNew;
